summary: The diff updates the app router to make Metablocks the '/' hub, adds first-class routes for six Metablocks modes, updates the shared header title to “Metablocks”, and updates the hub page to render Metablocks branding imagery and six mode tiles with navigation plus a Leaderboard button. However, the required generated asset files are not added in the diff, and the mode icon filenames used in HubPage do not match the BuildRequest’s specified filenames.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add and render Metablocks static branding assets from frontend/public/assets/generated, including a logo, hub background, and one icon per Metablocks mode.
missing_requirements.reason: HubPage references images under /assets/generated, but the diff shows no new files added under frontend/public/assets/generated (no assets are introduced in this change set). Additionally, the icon filenames used do not match the required image names listed in the BuildRequest.
evidence: File diff summary: ADDED FILES: none

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes “Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai” (heart emoji and external branding/link).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest requirements (REQ-19..REQ-22) and introduces additional user-facing content/branding.
